entry.title: TOP 3 Videos of the Week!!
entry.content: www.youtube.com Click here to watch Top 10 SUPER BOWL COMMERCIALS 2013! TOP 3 Videos of the Week!! Hey guys, it's Ricky here filling in for Khail while he's away but have no fear....We're still bringing you the Top 3 videos of the week because it's friday night and the mood is right TGIF or whatever. Oh yeah, don't forget to comment with your favorite Die Hard John McClane moment for a chance to win the 25th Anniversary Blu-Ray Box set! Here are the links so you can watch the full versions of all of these great vidz - #3 Drunk College Guy Vs. Top Bunk: www.youtube.com #2: The Harlem Shake v1: www.youtube.com #1: Kai, Hatchet Wielding Hitchhiker www.youtube.com Also, here are some bonus links to the best versions of this video - v2: www.youtube.com v3 (office): www.youtube.com anddd boooom....the #1 video of the week: Kai, the Hatchet Wielding Hitchhiker - www.youtube.com Included with every episode are 3 of the best ETC videos of the week so check those out too! Top 10 Superbowl Ads: www.youtube.com JJ Abrams and Gabe Newell Working Together?!: www.youtube.com Kevin Smith DIE HARD Exclusive: www.youtube.com thank you, come again. Song Included on this video is 'Harlem Shake" by Baauer and you can check him out on twitter here: twitter.com NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. A PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING. Open to legal residents of the US and DC (excluding PR),18 years or older. Void where prohibited by law. Sweepstakes begins at February 8, 2013, 5:00pm PST and ...

entry.title: Aliens: Colonial Marines -- Contact Extended Trailer
entry.content: Underlined with a classical piece of cinematic music by Golden Globe nominated composer Clint Mansell, the trailer takes viewers on a vertical ride through the USS Sulaco with US Colonial Marines fighting for their lives against an incoming wave of Xenomorphs. Developer: Gearbox Release: 2/12/2013 Genre: FPS Platform: PS3/X360/PC Publisher: Sega Website: www.sega.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com WANT TO JOIN THE MACHINIMA AFFILIATE PROGRAM? entry.title: Neverwinter -- The Siege of Neverwinter Trailer
entry.content: Taking place in the iconic Dungeons & Dragons city of Neverwinter, this free MMORPG will take you from the besieged walls of the city once known as The Jewel of The North to subterranean passageways in search of forgotten secrets and lost treasure. Epic stories, strategic action based gameplay and classic roleplaying await those heroes courageous enough to enter the fantastic world of Faerûn and the ruined city of Neverwinter. Developer: Cryptic Studios Release: Q1/2013 Genre: MMO/RPG Platform: PC Publisher: Perfect World Entertainment Website: www.playneverwinter.com FOR MACHINIMA'S BEST HIGH QUALITY SERIES, GO TO www.youtube.com FOR MORE MACHINIMA, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE SPORTS GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE MMO & RPG GAMEPLAY, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE COMPETITIVE GAMING, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE ANIMATIONS & SHORTS, GO TO: www.youtube.com FOR MORE TRAILERS, GO TO: www.youtube.com WANT TO JOIN THE MACHINIMA AFFILIATE PROGRAM?
